title: Am I sinful for watching videos of  Niqabi woman? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: Neela from Bangladesh Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh. Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullah. Sheikh I also follow and believe the opinion that even a woman is fully covered she's not allowed to click or upload photos on social media but I sometimes watch the videos of make-up influencers. Some videos are beneficial some are normal like their daily vlogs what they eat or what they do. Am I sinful for watching their videos? The answer is as long as what you're watching is halal and the content is halal you're watching another woman whether she's niqabi or uncovering her face or even not wearing the hijab totally. So there is no sin on you watching another woman because she's from the same gender and there is no aura exposed that you're supposed to lower your gaze. If the content is beneficial this is fine.
